title: In Regards to Goat vs GD team match tomorrow.
body:
There  has been some controversy over the bacon and chickenwrap rivalry, now I enjoy bacon as much as the next man, but I find chickenwraps to be slightly healthier AND more filling.

that being said, I think any legitimate rivalries should stay out of the first match, it is supposed to be good clean fun with very little rage and in a light-hearted manor, as the original organizer wanted.

Afterwards, I think that there is definitely room for roster changes and chickenwrap vs baconstr1pz could happen, but tbh... it should be approved by the all mighty officiator, Pleep.

It is supposed to be good clean fun... lets try to maintain that idea until we actually complete it. Afterwards we can form another, most likely more brutal match up against the higher ups.
